com.samskivert.servlet.user
Class User

java.lang.Object
  com.samskivert.servlet.user.User

public class User
extends Object

A user object contains information about a registered user in our web application environment. Users are stored in the user repository (a database table) and loaded during a request based on authentication information provided with the request headers.

Note: Do not modify any of the fields of this object directly. Use the set methods to make updates. If no set methods exist, you shouldn't be modifying that field.

Field Summary
 Date created
          The date this record was created.
 String email
          The user's email address.
 String password
          The user's chosen password (encrypted).
 String realname
          The user's real name (first, last and whatever else they opt to provide).
 int siteId
          The site identifier of the site through which the user created their account.
 int userId
          The user's assigned integer userid.
 String username
          The user's chosen username.

Returns:

isDeleted

public boolean isDeleted()
Returns:
true if this User has been "deleted".

isAdmin

public boolean isAdmin()
Returns true if this user is an admin, false otherwise. The default implementation does not track admin status and always returns false.
